channel.title: Chris Burgin on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Chris Burgin on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Overfarming and Software Development
item.description: Land, like everything, has an equilibrium. At once you can either store for the future or take from the future but there are limits to both. Software development, like everything, has an equilibrium. At once you can either store for the future or take from the future but there are limits to both. The best we can do in both is to strive for equilibrium.

item.title: About
item.description: About My name is Chris Burgin, I am a Software Developer and Engineering Manager @1password. You can find me on social in the following location: Twitter and Github.
